name: Brick road
tagline: Spawning random directory trees like a video game dungeon in a RPG
body:
brick_road
==========

Spawning random directory trees like a video game RPG dungeon

Only required command line argument is the name of the root folder, like C:\junk
Optional argument is a URL of a website to pull words off of (default is CNN)

This could use some help, but as a pranking tool, it works ok

[See releases tab for binaries](http://github.com/andrew-pa/brick_road/releases)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
